title: Awesome Video
header:
# Awesome Video [![Awesome](https://cdn.rawgit.com/sindresorhus/awesome/d7305f38d29fed78fa85652e3a63e154dd8e8829/media/badge.svg)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome)
 
<!-- 

PLEASE DO NOT UPDATE THIS FILE, UPDATE CONTENTS.JSON INSTEAD. THANK YOU :-)

 -->
header_contributing: Please take a quick look at the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/krzemienski/awesome-video/blob/master/.github/CONTRIBUTING.md) first. If you see a package or project here that is no longer maintained or is not a good fit, please submit a pull request to improve this file. Thank you to all [contributors](https://github.com/krzemienski/awesome-video/graphs/contributors); you rock!!

categories.title: Intro & Learning
categories.description: Fundamental concepts, history, and educational resources for video streaming.

categories.title: Introduction
categories.description: A high-level overview of video as a medium, its technical basics and creative impact.

categories.title: Learning Resources
categories.description: Curated articles, books, courses, and talks offering in-depth knowledge of video streaming.

categories.title: Tutorials & Case Studies
categories.description: Practical tutorials and real-world case studies demonstrating video streaming implementations.

categories.title: Protocols & Transport
categories.description: Resources covering the protocols and transport mechanisms that drive video delivery.

categories.title: Adaptive Streaming
categories.description: Standards and tools for adaptive streaming, primarily focused on HLS and DASH.

categories.title: HLS
categories.description: Dedicated resources, libraries, and tools for HTTP Live Streaming.

categories.title: DASH
categories.description: Dedicated resources, libraries, and tools for Dynamic Adaptive Streaming over HTTP.

categories.title: Transport Protocols
categories.description: Protocols that ensure reliable video transport such as RIST, SRT, and RTMP.

categories.title: RIST
categories.description: Resources focused on the Reliable Internet Stream Transport protocol.

categories.title: SRT
categories.description: Resources dedicated to the Secure Reliable Transport protocol.

categories.title: RTMP
categories.description: Resources covering the Real-Time Messaging Protocol for video.

categories.title: Encoding & Codecs
categories.description: Technologies and tools for video encoding, transcoding, and codec implementation.

categories.title: Encoding Tools
categories.description: Utilities and libraries (including FFMPEG-based solutions) for encoding and transcoding video.

categories.title: FFMPEG
categories.description: Resources, configurations, and scripts based on FFMPEG for video processing.

categories.title: Other Encoders
categories.description: Additional encoding libraries and tools beyond FFMPEG.

categories.title: Codecs
categories.description: Implementations and libraries for modern video codecs.

categories.title: HEVC
categories.description: Resources and tools for the HEVC (H.265) codec.

categories.title: VP9
categories.description: Libraries, tools, and examples for the VP9 codec.

categories.title: AV1
categories.description: Resources and implementations for the emerging AV1 codec.

categories.title: Players & Clients
categories.description: Software and hardware solutions for video playback across platforms.

categories.title: Hardware Players
categories.description: Dedicated players for devices like Roku, Smart TVs, and Chromecast.

categories.title: Roku
categories.description: Tools, SDKs, and examples specific to Roku app development.

categories.title: Smart TVs
categories.description: Player frameworks and SDKs tailored for Smart TV platforms.

categories.title: Chromecast
categories.description: Libraries and resources for developing Chromecast-enabled video apps.

categories.title: Mobile & Web Players
categories.description: Playback solutions and SDKs for mobile devices and web browsers.

categories.title: iOS/tvOS
categories.description: Tools and SDKs for video playback on Apple's iOS and tvOS platforms.

categories.title: Android
categories.description: Player solutions and SDKs for Android devices and FireTV.

categories.title: Web Players
categories.description: HTML5 and browser-based video players and frameworks.

categories.title: Media Tools
categories.description: Utilities to enhance and manage media content in video streaming workflows.

categories.title: Audio & Subtitles
categories.description: Libraries and tools for audio processing and subtitle/caption integration.

categories.title: Audio
categories.description: Tools for processing and managing audio streams within video content.

categories.title: Subtitles & Captions
categories.description: Libraries and utilities for creating and managing subtitles and closed captions.

categories.title: Ads & QoE
categories.description: Resources for integrating advertising and measuring quality of experience (QoE) in video streaming.

categories.title: Advertising
categories.description: Tools and platforms focused on video advertising and monetization strategies.

categories.title: Quality & Testing
categories.description: Solutions for assessing video quality and testing streaming performance.

categories.title: Standards & Industry
categories.description: Official specifications, standards, and industry resources shaping video streaming.

categories.title: Specs & Standards
categories.description: Documentation on official video streaming specifications, including MPEG standards and related forums.

categories.title: Official Specs
categories.description: Direct access to official technical specifications and standards documentation.

categories.title: MPEG & Forums
categories.description: Resources covering MPEG standards and industry discussions about video technology.

categories.title: Vendors & HDR
categories.description: Vendor-specific documentation and resources, including HDR guidelines and product specifications.

categories.title: Vendor Docs
categories.description: Technical documentation and support resources provided by industry vendors.

categories.title: HDR Guidelines
categories.description: Best practices and technical standards for implementing HDR in video streaming.

categories.title: Infrastructure & Delivery
categories.description: Backend systems and cloud technologies that enable reliable video content delivery.

categories.title: Streaming Servers
categories.description: Software platforms for hosting video origins, managing storage, and serving content.

categories.title: Origin Servers
categories.description: Solutions for origin server management and content distribution.

categories.title: Storage Solutions
categories.description: Systems designed to store and manage large volumes of video content.

categories.title: Cloud & CDN
categories.description: Cloud platforms and content delivery network (CDN) integrations that optimize video delivery.

categories.title: Cloud Platforms
categories.description: Orchestration and cloud service providers (e.g., Kubernetes, AWS, GCP) for streaming infrastructures.

categories.title: CDN Integration
categories.description: Tools and resources for integrating CDNs with video streaming services.

categories.title: General Tools
categories.description: Miscellaneous utilities that streamline video processing and security workflows.

categories.title: FFMPEG & Tools
categories.description: A collection of FFMPEG-based scripts, libraries, and utilities for advanced video processing.

categories.title: DRM
categories.description: Digital rights management solutions and resources to secure video content and manage licensing.

categories.title: Community & Events
categories.description: Resources and platforms that facilitate networking, collaboration, and industry events in video streaming.

categories.title: Community Groups
categories.description: Online communities, forums, Slack channels, and meetups for video professionals.

categories.title: Online Forums
categories.description: Dedicated discussion boards and online communities focused on video streaming technology.

categories.title: Slack & Meetups
categories.description: Resources for real-time chat groups and local meetup events in the video streaming community.

categories.title: Events & Conferences
categories.description: A comprehensive list of conferences, talks, webinars, and podcasts related to video streaming.

categories.title: Conferences
categories.description: Major industry conferences and live events dedicated to video streaming.

categories.title: Podcasts & Webinars
categories.description: Recorded talks, webinars, and podcasts sharing insights on video streaming trends and technology.

projects.description: 👻 A curated list of awesome FFmpeg resources.
projects.title: transitive-bullshit/awesome-ffmpeg

projects.description: Uncompressed 4K demos, samples, and trailers, to show off your new ultra-HD (2160p) HDR/HLG/Dolby Vision television or monitor.
projects.title: 4K Media | Free Ultra-HD / HDR / HLG / Dolby Vision 4K Video Demos
